short_summary: Professional service contract to provide innovative IT supports
description:
The Innovation, Transformation and Technology Branch (IITB) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires a variety of Information Management (IM)/Information Technology (IT) professional resource services with knowledge and experience supporting and assisting with Government of Canada strategize and realise its cloud adoption model and how it will become a cloud native department

NOTE: This procurement is set aside for Indigenous business under the federal government Set-aside Program for Indigenous Business
duration_in_months: It can vary by contract variable duration or firm fixed please consult the contract documents
